PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter Starting Vend No. or (ALL) Text PPDField01 1 8 R Enter a valid vendor # or (ALL)
Enter Ending Vendor or (ALL) Text PPDField02 1 8 R Enter a valid ending vendor # or (ALL)
Enter Ending Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField03 6 8 R Enter an ending date in the form (MM/DD/YY)
Enter Ending Period (YYYYPP) Text PPDField04 3 6 R Enter a valid ending period (YYYYPP)
Sort Selection (A)lpha or (N)umeric DropDown PPDField05 1 1 R Enter (A) for alpha sort or (N) for numeric sort. H N,A N,A
Enter Division No. or (ALL) Text PPDField06 1 3 R Enter a valid division # or (ALL)
